main event: A witness observed a bright, disc-shaped object with a rotating red light hovering over the woods in Lynn, Massachusetts on the night of May 6, 1965, before it shot straight up into the sky.
interesting points: The object was reported to be approximately 150 feet above the ground., The object was described as silver in color., The witness was shaken and reported the incident to local authorities., Another witness, Mr. John Dearborn, saw a similar lighted object on May 23, 1965 while driving., Mr. Dearborn noted that the object emitted pulsating bright white light and colored lights.
sighted object: disc-shaped object with a rotating red light
witness description: Female witness and Mr. John Dearborn, both local residents.
